__TOC__

* Ubuntu hour - lectures for beginners were held in Belgrade haklab, every Tuesday.

* On Thursday 5th, Balkan Computer Congress - BalCCon were held. Ubuntu LoCo has presentation of local community and new Ubuntu realizes.

* On Saturday 20th, Software Freedom Day Party was held at the O3on gallery at Belgrade.

* On Sunday 7th, 14th, 21st and 28th, Administration team meeting was held.
